definition: nursing student/(Buddhism) to preserve the lives of all living beings
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: The nursing students tented to have a positive attitude towards computers.
sentences.chinese: 護生對電腦的態度是正向的。

sentences.english: Objective To raise the manipulative ability of clinical nursing skills of the college nursing students.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高專科護生臨牀護理技術操作能力。

sentences.english: To elaborated the clinical teaching situation of nursing students from Finland.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了對來自芬蘭護生的臨牀教學情況。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate probationer nurses' knowledge about nosocomial infection (NI).
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解實習護生醫院感染知識知曉情況。

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the safety issues in intravenous infusion among nursing students during clinical practice.
sentences.chinese: 目的解決臨牀實習護生在靜脈輸液安全中出現的問題。

sentences.english: Method The investigation was conducted on nursing college undergraduates using self-designed questionnaire.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用自設問卷對本科護生進行調查。

definition: Yanshou county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang/to extend life
to pass on the light of Buddha
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to exhort (sb) to live a virtuous life (Buddhism)/to beg for alms
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
boundless life (expression of good wishes)/Amitayus, the Buddha of measureless life, good fortune and wisdom
to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)
unity of will is an impregnable stronghold (idiom)
